#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  int tc;
  cin >> tc;
  while (tc--) {
    string s, t = "";
    cin >> s;
    long long k;
    cin >> k;
    while (k > 0) {
      t += (k & 1) ? '1' : '0';
      k >>= 1;
    }
    reverse(s.begin(), s.end());
    while (s.length() < t.length())
      s += '0';
    while (t.length() < s.length())
      t += '0';
    string res = "";
    int x = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
      x += (s[i] - '0') + (t[i] - '0');
      res += x & 1 ? '1' : '0';
      x /= 2;
    }
    if (x) res += '1';
    reverse(res.begin(), res.end());
    cout << res << endl;
  }
}
